content: i designed this afghan block to honor the brave people of ukraine it features a yellow sunflower on a blue background representing both ukraine s national flower and the colors of the ukrainian flag the block shown is 7″ square it is made with a size h hook and loops & threads impeccable yarn in colors soft taupe sunflower center butterscotch sunflower petals and clear blue background you can use the weight 4 yarn and colors of your choice block size may vary slightly depending on the yarn hook and gauge used included is a pattern to crochet the block followed by instructions for using the blocks to make a crib-sized afghan with additional yarn you can adapt these instructions to make any size afghan you like
